summary: This release is mostly about fixing the plumbing. I replaced the markdown sanitizer to handle more tags properly, swapped out the notification library to fix some hydration quirks, and untangled the UI package dependencies so everything builds cleanly. Also had to remove Mermaid diagrams for now to get around a Cloudflare Workers compatibility issue.

fixes: Remove mermaid dependency to resolve Cloudflare Workers crypto issue
Remove unsupported --compatibility-flags from wrangler pages deploy
Expand DOMPurify allowed tags and attributes for markdown content
Replace React sonner with svelte-sonner to fix hydration errors
Use workspace reference for @groveengine/ui to avoid stale npm version
Use workspace:* for @groveengine/ui in all packages
Build UI package before example-site in CI workflow
Bump engine to 0.3.3, use npm version for @groveengine/ui
docs: Update TODOS with v0.3.0 CI/CD status
